backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style configuration defining OKLCH theme variables and global styling rules with dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation between camera, editor, and gallery while defining shared Photo/Video types.
frontend/src/components/camera/MobileCam: Renders mobile and desktop camera control overlays with buttons for switching camera, timers, grid, mirroring, zoom, and capture/record actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation buttons for camera and gallery plus theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/HelpModal.tsx: Help dialog explaining permissions, video recording, tools, filters, and storage using scrollable sections.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a metadata query that depends on the actor and currently returns placeholder data.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoRecorder.ts: Implements a MediaRecorder-based video recording hook handling start, stop, pause, resume, errors, and blob URL generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and utility styles for the camera UI.
frontend/src/lib/filters.ts: Provides canvas-based image filters and beauty effects including color adjustments, blur, sharpen, and edge detection.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Provides IndexedDB helpers to save, retrieve, and delete photos and videos, generating video URLs from stored blobs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/CameraScreen.tsx: Implements camera UI for capturing photos and videos, handling timers, recording, previews, and saving media.
frontend/src/pages/EditorScreen.tsx: Provides a photo editing interface with filters, beauty tools, masks, rotations, stickers, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryScreen.tsx: Displays saved photos and videos with options to view, export, delete, and clear all media while tracking storage usage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, versioning, and a list of implemented camera‑app features including capture, filters, editing tools, gallery, and persistence. Contains metadata for build planning without architectural notes or issues.
